author: smuzaffar
body:
This PR proposes to drop the unmaintained Alignment/Cocoa packages for CMSSW_16_1_X and above. We can also drop the `meschach` externals which is also not maintained for last 20 years.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49897
title: Drop Alignment/Cocoa packages
